description: Another opportunity to help struggling young people. This unusually cheerful boy called me to his home to solve his debt to the landlord. After loosing his job the boy wasn´t able to pay the rent, which brought him into debt. After three months the owner had enough. Pay up tomorrow or get the hell out of my property! The boy didn´t realize how serious his situation was. He was about to loose everything, including his girlfriend. I´ve seen that happen so many times. But I knew he would get his life sorted if he was given a chance. My naughty offer was exactly that. He agreed, very reluctantly. I had his lean body at my full disposal. I don´t often meet  boys who get excited by the whole situation. This one was exactly like that. At least judging by his rock solid erection.
title: Debt Dandy 131
